beers.name: Guinness Draught
beers.description: Famous for its dark color, creamy head, and roasted flavor.

beers.name: Heineken
beers.description: A pale lager beer with a slightly bitter taste and smooth finish.

beers.name: Hoegaarden
beers.description: A cloudy Belgian white beer with hints of orange peel and coriander.

beers.name: Sapporo Premium
beers.description: A crisp, refreshing lager with a clean finish and dry character.

beers.name: Corona Extra
beers.description: Light-bodied with a mild flavor, often served with lime.

beers.name: Chimay Blue
beers.description: Rich and complex with dark fruit, caramel, and spice flavors.
